vulnerability.name: USN-4078-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4078-1 fixed several vulnerabilities in openldap. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that OpenLDAP incorrectly handled rootDN delegation. A  database administrator could use this issue to request authorization as an  identity from another database, contrary to expectations. (CVE-2019-13057)   It was discovered that OpenLDAP incorrectly handled SASL authentication and  session encryption. After a first SASL bind was completed, it was possible  to obtain access by performing simple binds, contrary to expectations.  (CVE-2019-13565)

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in OpenLDAP. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
